companyDescription: Velesto Energy Berhad is a Malaysia based multinational provider of services for the upstream sector of the oil and gas industry. The Group owns and operates six premium jackup drilling rigs, which are capable of operating in water depths of up to 400 feet - ideal for the shallow waters of South East Asia. Velesto is also a provider of workover services through its fleet of hydraulic workover units. To ensure continuity and quality in the drilling sector, Velesto plays its part through Velesto Drilling Academy.
